tool_description: Verify a South African VAT number
name: South African VAT API
title: South African VAT API

api_list.name: Verify South African VAT number
api_list.description: Verify a south african VAT Number
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://south-african-vat-api.p.rapidapi.com/default/ZAVAT"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "south-african-vat-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://south-african-vat-api.p.rapidapi.com/default/ZAVAT"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "south-african-vat-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
